text: Masu Bhurgri is a Union Council of Hyderabad Taluka (rural) in the Sindh province of Pakistan. It has a population of 24,362. It is located at 25°30'0N 68°28'0E to the north-east of the district capital - Hyderabad.Location of Masu Bhurgari - Falling Rain Genomics ==References== Category:Union councils of Hyderabad District
title: Masu Bhurgri
